user_question: How can I grow a bonsai tree from seed, and can you generate an image of a bonsai tree in a Zen garden?
final_answer: To grow a bonsai tree from seed: 1) Choose a tree species suitable for bonsai. 2) Soak seeds in water for 24 hours. 3) Plant seeds in a well-draining soil mix. 4) Keep soil moist and provide indirect sunlight. 5) Be patient, as germination can take weeks to months. Image of a bonsai tree in a Zen garden generated. The best soil for bonsai trees is a well-draining mix, often composed of akadama, pumice, and lava rock.
